subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Olmstead, with pinpoint passing, helped Montreal win five Stanley Cups in the 1950s. He did the same with the Toronto Maple Leafs in 1962.
snippet: Olmstead, with pinpoint passing, helped Montreal win five Stanley Cups in the 1950s. He did the same with the Toronto Maple Leafs in 1962.
